text: V den' velikogo khadzha k lyudyam [pridet] vest' ot Allakha i Yego Poslannika: "Allakh, a takzhe Yego Poslannik otstupayutsya ot mnogobozhnikov. Yesli vy raskayetes', to tem luchshe dlya vas. Yesli zhe vy otvratites' [ot Allakha i Poslannika], to znayte, chto vam ne oslabit' [moshchi] Allakha. Vozvesti zhe [, Mukhammad,] o muchitel'nom nakazanii nevernym
